Class Period

java.lang.Object
  Period

public class Period
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a period of time. It consists of two times: a start time and an end time.

Version:
2010.12.04
Author:
Sebastian Olsson

              int startMinute,

Creates a Period.

Parameters:
startHour - The input hour of the start time.

Method Detail

getEndTime

public Time getEndTime()
Returns:
The time at which the period ends.

getPeriodString

public java.lang.String getPeriodString()
Returns:
A String of the period written in the form HH:MM-HH:MM.

getStartTime

public Time getStartTime()
Returns:
The time at which the period starts.

within

public boolean within(Time time)
Parameters:
time - The investigated time.
Returns:
True if the time is within the period, else false.
